content.rendered:
Directed by Madhur Bhandarkar.

Written by Madhur Bhandarkar. Abhiruchi Chand. Anil Pandey. Rohit G. Banawlikar. Madhur Bhandarkar. Anil Pandey. Rohit G. Banawlikar. Rohit G. Banawlikar.

Cast Akanksha Puri(Nandita Menon). Avani Modi(Nazneen Malik). Kyra Dutt(Sharon Pinto). Ruhi Singh(Mayuri Chauhan). Satarupa Pyne(Paroma Ghosh) . Karan Aanand(Palash Bose). Rajeev Anand(Neval Boyfriend). Madhur Bhandarkar(Self). Samiksha Bhatnagar(Sharda (Nandita’s Sister)). Nikhil Dave(Director of Mayuri’s Launch Movie).Parikshit Gosain. Sanjay Gurbaxani(Channel Head). Kiran Kumar(Narang). Yogesh Lakhani(Jury). Atul Parchure(Tiwari ji). Sharad Ponkshe(Vignesh Pranajpe CBI Officer). Rushad Rana(Aniruddha Shroff).Rohit Roy. Vikram Sakhalkar(Harsh narang). Abhimanyu Sarkar(Friends). Indraneil Sengupta(Shashank (Sharon’s Husband)). Keith Sequeira(Pinaki chatterji). Suhel Seth(Kumar Kukreja, Calendar sponsor). Shishir Sharma(Mayuri’s Father). Sharma M Shishir((as Shishir Sharma)). Mita Vashisht(Anana raichand). Deepak Wadhwa(Inzamam (Nazneen’s Boyfriend))

Language Hindi.

Producers Krishna Ahir. Sangeeta Ahir. Aishwarya. Madhur Bhandarkar. Renu Bhandarkar. Vinay Chaukar. Sumit Karangutkar. Kiran. Sanjay Mehta.

Production Zahara Productions.
